From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron continued to hover further back, keeping his eyes on
Firestrike. His chest compartment opened up, as a device rose slowly out
of it, a binocular type gadget, that lowered over his eyes, as he looked
at Alpha Dolphy. "No no, we do not double team a Decepticon warrior,
especially one as proud as Firestrike." He whispered to himself, as he
held up his one free hand. His wrist compartment opened up, as his hand
slid back into the joint, then was replaced by a thin barrel. He
extended his arm, and fired a blast of laser first at Alpha Dolphy, then
in behind of Prowl, in an attempt to give Firestrike a safe escape.

OOC: The laser isnt very powerful, and if it hits would only stun for a
second at the most, it would not cause any dammage.
